charges.charge_description: 18:1951, 2 INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE - unlawfully took narcotic pills and controlled substances by threatened force from Rite Aid pharmacy(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 96 months to be followed by 3 years S/R with special conditions including: restitution payments; no new credit charges or lines of credit w/o approval; provide USPO access to requested financial info; intensive drug treatment if no program was completed while incarcerated
